from vpython import *

# Parameter Settings
M = 1e10
m = 1e3
G = 1
d = 1
h = 0.1 * d
k = 2 * G * M / d**3
T = 2 * pi * sqrt(m / k)
v0 = 0
t = 0
dt = T / 5000
i = 0

# Visualization Settings
s1 = sphere(pos=vector(-d, 0, 0), radius=0.1 * d, color=color.red)
s2 = sphere(pos=vector(d, 0, 0), radius=0.1 * d, color=color.red)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.1 * d, color=color.green, make_trail=True, trail_type="points", retain=50)
line = curve(vector(-d, 0, 0), vector(d, 0, 0))
top = curve(vector(0, h, 0), vector(0, -h, 0))
v_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos + vector(1, 0, 0), axis=vector(v0, 0, 0), shaftwidth=0.05, color=color.yellow)
a_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos + vector(2, 0, 0), axis=vector(0, 0, 0), shaftwidth=0.05, color=color.magenta)
gd = graph(title="y-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="y", fast=False)
yt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)
gd2 = graph(title="v-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="v", fast=False)
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)
gd3 = graph(title="a-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="a", fast=False)
at = gcurve(graph=gd3, color=color.red)

# Object Motion
while i < 5:
    rate(1000)
    r1 = ball.pos - s1.pos
    r2 = ball.pos - s2.pos
    F = - G * M * m * norm(r1) / mag2(r1) - G * M * m * norm(r2) / mag2(r2)
    a = F / m
    ball.v += a * dt
    ball.pos += ball.v * dt
    t += dt
    v_arrow.pos = ball.pos + vector(1, 0, 0)
    v_arrow.axis = ball.v
    a_arrow.pos = ball.pos + vector(2, 0, 0)
    a_arrow.axis = a
    yt.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    vt.plot(t, ball.v.y)
    at.plot(t, a.y)
    if ball.pos.y > h:
        i += 1
        print("t = ", t, ", i = ", i)

from vpython import *

# Parameter Settings
M = 1e10
m = 1e3
G = 1
d = 1
h = 0.1 * d
k = 2 * G * M / d**3
T = 2 * pi * sqrt(m / k)
v0 = 0
t = 0
dt = T / 5000
i = 0
Radius_I = 0.1 * d

# Visualization Settings
s1 = sphere(pos=vector(-d, 0, 0), radius=0.1 * d, color=color.red)
s2 = sphere(pos=vector(d, 0, 0), radius=0.1 * d, color=color.red)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.green, make_trail=True, trail_type="points", retain=50)
line = curve(vector(-d, 0, 0), vector(d, 0, 0))
top = curve(vector(0, h, 0), vector(0, -h, 0))
v_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos + vector(1, 0, 0), axis=vector(v0, 0, 0), shaftwidth=0.05, color=color.yellow)
a_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos + vector(2, 0, 0), axis=vector(0, 0, 0), shaftwidth=0.05, color=color.magenta)
gd = graph(title="y-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="y", fast=False)
yt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)
gd2 = graph(title="v-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="v", fast=False)
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)
gd3 = graph(title="a-t plot", xtitle="t", ytitle="a", fast=False)
at = gcurve(graph=gd3, color=color.red)

# Object Motion
while i < 5:
    rate(1000)
    r1 = ball.pos - s1.pos
    r2 = ball.pos - s2.pos
    F = - G * M * m * norm(r1) / mag(r1)**2 - G * M * m * norm(r2) / mag(r2)**2
    a = F / m
    ball.v += a * dt
    ball.pos += ball.v * dt
    t += dt
    v_arrow.pos = ball.pos + vector(1, 0, 0)
    v_arrow.axis = ball.v
    a_arrow.pos = ball.pos + vector(2, 0, 0)
    a_arrow.axis = a
    yt.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    vt.plot(t, ball.v.y)
    at.plot(t, a.y)
    if ball.pos.y > h:
        i += 1
        print("t = ", t, ", i = ", i)
